getChoiceOptional

public static <T> T getChoiceOptional(String message,
                                      T... choices)
Convenience for getChoices(message, 0, 1, choices).

Type Parameters:
T - is automatically inferred.
Parameters:
message - a String object.
choices - a T object.
Returns:
null if choices is missing, empty, or if the users' choices are empty; otherwise, returns the first item in the List returned by getChoices.
See Also:
getChoices(String, int, int, Object...)

getChoiceOptional

public static <T> T getChoiceOptional(String message,
                                      Iterator<T> choices)
Like getChoiceOptional, but this takes an Iterator instead of a variable number of arguments.

Type Parameters:
T - is automatically inferred.
Parameters:
message - a String object.
choices - an Iterator over T objects.
Returns:
null if choices is missing, empty, or if the users' choices are empty; otherwise, returns the first item in the List returned by getChoices.
See Also:
#getChoiceOptional(String, T...), getChoices(String, int, int, Object...)
